idea-plugin.name: DxyJsonToDart
idea-plugin.description:
Launch the IDE and open plugin settings

Search for "DxyJsonToDart" and click install

Open a flutter project, Right click on package -> New -> DxyJsonToDart

Input className and JSON data into the Plugin Dialog

The plugin will automatically add json_serializable related dependencies in the pubspec.yaml file

The plugin will automatically generate model classes

The plugin will automatically execute the command：flutter packages pub run build_runner build
idea-plugin.change-notes:
Automatically generate dart model classes from JSON

Automatically add json_serializable related dependencies in the pubspec.yaml file

Automatically execute the command：flutter packages pub run build_runner build
